name: Spacer Project: Asteroids
description:
TheRed Games published is first mobile game on Google Play !

This game is the "Asteroids" game mode from the pc version brough on smartphone.

Keep your finger pressed on the screen to move the ship where you want and dodge all the asteroids to get the highest score !

And also you can download and try the pc version here:

https://theredgames.itch.io/spacerproject

Spacer Project is a scoring game, it's why you can join the discord server to share your high score !  And also you can give us your feeback on it or you can follow us on our social network !

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/77KdtmH

WebSite: www.theredgames.com

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/TheREDGamesStudio

Twitter : https://twitter.com/GamesThered

Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/thered_games/
